title: FS:  Strong Raw T206 Including 2 Tinkers

posts.post_title: FS:  Strong Raw T206 Including 2 Tinkers
posts.post_content:
Dunn (Brooklyn) SC 350/25
EX-MT corners, no creases or wrinkles, light soiling on back SOLD

Tinker (Hands on Knees) SC 350/25
EX+ corners, hard-to-see wrinkle on back, super clean $235

Tinker (Bat Off Shoulder) P350
EX corners, light creasing (possibly paper defect original to card) $125

Wiltse (Pitching) P460/25
EX corners, tiny wrinkle on front, moderately off-center SOLD

Cards are guaranteed to receive a numerical grade from PSA or SGC (or I will refund purchase price).  Prices are delivered.  First committed email gets card.  Paypal preferred.

Scot

i'll take dunn and wiltse.

pete ullman

I'll take the Dunn if sale falls though... Thanks RP
